description: Harmonium Player Anywhere with MIDI SupportHarmonium Anywhere as name says is a best alternate to a real Harmonium.If you are travelling or has no access to real harmonium, or just need a quick practice before performance, you will find Harmonium Anywhere pretty handy.Samples are recorded from a high quality Made in India Harmonium.For quick practice sessions, this is a must have application.Harmonium Anywhere provides:- 3 octaves.- Multi touch keyboard.- Coupler feature (Right Octave).- Real harmonium high quality sound with 3 sustain levels.- Reference/Highlighter key, to allow especially kids to remember the start note.- Scale changer up to 12 notes.- Note identifier in 3 different formats: Western, Gurmukhi, Devanagari Notations.- Scroll lock feature to lock accidental scroll of keyboard.- Display Optimized for both iPhones and iPads.- Designed keeping the needs of Kids who don't have real harmoniums.- Compatible with other music apps, e.g. tabla apps on app store.- Zoom button added to provide more keys especially on iPads.- Now you can either record:  - Harmonium sound only  - Any sound including Harmonium with the help of in-built microphone.  - Playback recordings, share on social sites or with friends, teachers, etc.- Better sound clarity.- MIDI support- More features will follow based on user feedback/reviews.- Loop feature for each harmonium key

Welcome aboard the real-time flight tracking app with one of the best and most accurate coverage worldwide. Download the app for free and know the exact current position of every plane in the sky in real-time! Why is AirNav Radar the best and most accurate?Most airplanes today are equipped with ADS-B transponders (Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast radio transmitter-responders) that transmit their position - latitude, longitude, altitude - speed and the aircraft unique identifier. AirNav Systems designs, produces and distributes ADS-B radio receivers. We maintain a network of more than 9.000 receivers (and counting) all over the world. With a team of aviation technology experts working in the constant optimization of the platform signal processing capabilities AirNav Radar is the best and most accurate flight tracker available.Features:- Get individual live flight information and see an airplane photo of any aircraft that is in the sky.- Check flight details like aircraft make and model, route, altitude, position and speed. Even specific photos for each aircraft, courtesy from aircraft spotters from all over the world!- See the last 7 days of flight information and watch replays of past flights.- Know all arrival and departure flights of any airport and it's status: if it's delayed, still in flight, in taxi and any status information provided by the airplane squawk code.- Search flights through flight number, company, airport, altitude and speed.- Multi-source data: we get data from ADS-B, ASDI (US radar based flight information), Oceanic, Multilateration, Satellite and Estimated and cross-reference several data points to give you the most accurate information that technology can provide.SpotterSame feature set as Free plan, plus:- Ad-free experience. If you subscribe a premium plan you won't see or hear any ads.- Continuous real-time flight tracking. No map timeouts after ten minutes.- Listen in on 1 hour of radio transmission chatter from any control tower.- Full flight details. Get the full flight speed and altitude graph.- Get Terrain, Satellite and Hybrid map layers.- See the last 30 days of information and watch replays of past flights.- Get priority support.PilotSame feature set as Spotter plan, plus:- Listen to radio transmission chatter from any control tower. Unlimited.- Get Terrain, Satellite, Hybrid and SkyVector map layers.- Add a weather layer to the map to know current weather conditions everywhere.- Remove distracting information in Fullscreen Mode.- Advanced filtering. See only what you want.- Download raw data (limited to 10 downloads per month).BusinessSame feature set as Pilot plan, plus:- See 365 days of information and watch replays of past flights.- Add flights to a list and track your fleet.- Airport view: know all flights arriving or departing from an airport as well as other status information about each airport such as weather and visibility conditions.- Download raw data (limited to 100 downloads per month).Subscription conditions:- Subscribe to a premium plan on a monthly or yearly basis.- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicablehttps://www.airnavradar.com/terms-of-useHave a safe flight, you are cleared for take-off!Make a blip in our radar or throw us your paper airplane:Email: support@airnavradar.com

Code de la route 2023 est l’application mobile du site codedelaroute.io qui compte 1'000’000 inscrits et 93% de réussite à l’examen du code de la route.Nous vous offrons 7 jours gratuits pendant lesquels vous aurez un accès illimité à tous nos contenus sur l’application mobile et sur notre site Internet. Vous disposerez de tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour obtenir le code rapidement avec ou sans auto-école :- 31 examens blancs en conditions réelles.- 1500 questions, cours et vidéo en 3D conformes à l'examen officiel du code de la route 2023, rédigées par des professionnels diplômés de l’ECSR (Enseignement de la Conduite et de la Sécurité Routière). La base de questions officielles du code de la route comporte 1000 questions. Nous avons donc sélectionné uniquement les questions essentielles à votre réussite pour vous permettre d’être prêt à passer l’examen plus rapidement.- Suivi de votre progression.- Mode hors ligne pour réviser lorsque vous n’avez pas Internet.- Mode horizontal pour un plus grand confort de révision.- Guide pour obtenir son numéro NEPH et s’inscrire au code de la route en candidat libre.- Réservation de votre session d’examen dans un des 790 centres partenaires La Poste (30€ prix fixé par le Ministère).- Un coach virtuel vous indique lorsque vous êtes prêt à passer le code.4,5 étoiles sur 5 Quelques avis de nos utilisateurs :« Premier examen du code raté après 7 mois à l’auto-école et en même pas 2 semaines avec cette application j’ai eu mon code »06/08/19 — Alyly Shakurette« J’ai passé mon code il y a 15 ans, me voici de nouveau obligé de le passer à nouveau pour obtenir un nouveau permis. En faisant les codes blancs, je n’arrive pas à moins de 10 fautes, même au bout de 10... cependant, les questions sont techniques... après révision des cours puis une dizaine de codes blancs, je me lance pour l’examen , obtention du code avec seulement 2 fautes. J’ai révisé à fond pendant seulement 2 jours... merci l’application qui prépare très bien. »09/07/2019 — Jeff« Juste pour vous dire merci pourquoi grâce à vous j’ai eu mon code ! J’avais déjà révisée avec d’autre site, et cela faisait 6 mois que je révisais et j’avais échouée 2 fois au code, je me suis inscrite mardi j’ai passée mon code le vendredi, et je l’ai eu avec 3 fautes seulement, merci beaucoup ! La version gratuite m’a suffit en plus ! »09/07/2019 — boudraasefanaPour toute question ou suggestion, n’hésitez pas à nous contacter sur contact@codedelaroute.ioBonnes révisions !7 jours gratuits offerts : La version premium offre un essai automatique de 7 jours suivi d'un abonnement hebdomadaire de 4,99€ qui donne accès aux examens et aux leçons. Le paiement sera débité du compte iTunes lors de la confirmation de l'achat. L'abonnement est automatiquement renouvelé sauf si le renouvellement automatique est désactivé au moins 24 heures avant la fin de la période en cours. Le compte sera débité pour le renouvellement dans les 24 heures précédant la fin de la période en cours, et identifiera le coût du renouvellement. Les abonnements peuvent être gérés par l'utilisateur et le renouvellement automatique peut être désactivé en allant dans les paramètres du compte de l'utilisateur après l'achat. Toute partie non utilisée d'une période d'essai gratuite, si elle est offerte, sera perdue lorsque l'utilisateur achètera un abonnement à cette publication, le cas échéant.Conditions générales : https://codedelaroute.io/apiv2/cgu

NFC is supported on iPhone 7 or newer only; iPad and iPod Touch do not have the hardware to interact with NFC tags.-----Read, write, interact, and hack your NFC tags on your supporting iPhone!Smart NFC is one of the first apps to support native NFC writing directly from your device. With numerous custom records to get you started, you'll be writing to most NDEF-formatted NFC tags in no time. Don't have any NDEF-formatted tags? Format them in the Advanced section.Tag-specific features are being added that allow you to edit a tag's memory directly, which opens the doors to all kinds of new features!Tag not scanning? NDEF format new tags from the Advanced section to get them working right!An NFC tag is written with a single "Message" which contains any number of "Records." These records define text, links, and data to be stored on the tag. Most tags can be scanned by holding the top of your iPhone within a few centimeters. A chip is only limited only by its size. As long as the chip is NDEF-formatted (most are, and other formats will be supported in a later version) and it has enough space, the limits are endless!Features:- Read, write, duplicate, erase, and permanently lock NDEF-formatted tags- Monitor a tag's max capacity (usually somewhere between 256-1024 Bytes)- Read, write, and interact with links (https://, sms://, facetime://, mailto:, etc.)- Write a variety of pre-defined Social Media and website records- Read and write text records with multiple language localizations- Use Background Tag Reading to interact with NFC tags without an app. Write a link to a tag and then tap it to your phone. Voila! (Supported on iPhone XS and newer)- Review and rewrite previous messages from your History to another tag- Format factory-programmed tags as NDEF tags in-app (Supports most common tags such as Type 2 and Type 5 NFC tags)- Read and write directly to a tag's memory- Send custom commands directly to a tag- And of course, target your users better by using a tag's unique identifierExtras:- Dark Mode- Privacy: we collect nothing as you use the app.Supported Devices:- NFC scanning is available on iPhone 7 and newer. iPad and iPod Touch do not have the required hardware.- Background Tag Reading is available on iPhone XS and newer. iOS will present a notification for the first valid link stored on a tag.Supported Tags:- Any NDEF-formatted tags- MIFARE Ultralight- NTAG 213/215/216- NXP ICODE® Tags, ISO 15693 Tags, and Type 5 TagsFuture support for:- MIFARE DESFireLimitations:- MIFARE Classic tags are not currently supported by iOSFuture features:- Include a tag's ID and/or its read count in a record- Password-protect an NFC chip- Connect to a Bluetooth deviceFeel free to Tweet feature requests to me at @0xA1EC

The 30-Day Perfect Pup CourseCreated by renowned dog trainer Zak George, is a comprehensive online program designed to guide dog owners through the essentials of dog training over 30 days. This course covers a wide range of topics, including basic obedience commands, house training, crate training, leash walking, and socialization. Each day features step-by-step video lessons, practical exercises, and expert tips to help you build a strong, positive relationship with your pup. Whether you're a new dog owner or looking to refine your dog's behavior, this course provides all the tools and knowledge you need for successful training.Desensitization SoundsPupford's Desensitization Sounds feature is a powerful tool designed to help your dog become accustomed to common noises that can cause anxiety or fear. This feature offers a curated library of high-quality soundtracks, including thunderstorms, fireworks, doorbells, and more, to gradually expose your dog to these sounds in a controlled and positive manner. Head out, head up.3. Log your bird sightings - one at a time or multiple sightings as part of a birding session.CITIZEN SCIENCEYour bird sightings have a direct impact on helping conservation, so all that time in nature is good not only for you but also for the planet. Birda sends all of the sightings data it collects to the Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF) so that scientists can use it to understand more about the world’s bird species and their habitats.YOU CAN ALSO:•	Use AI to identify bird species in photos•	Find birding locations & the bird species that occur there•	Use the field guide to identify what you have seen with reference images and bird calls•	Set birding goals•	Get bird identification suggestions from the community•	Help the community as a bird identifier•	Unlock achievement badges•	Take part in challenges•	Automatically create bird life lists•	See what birds other users have spotted•	Log sightings even when you’re offline•	Choose from multiple taxonomies (IOC, Clements & Birdlife HBW)IMPORTS & EXPORTSIf you are coming from another platform, then there is no better way to get started than to import your records to Birda. We currently support imports from eBird, iNaturalist, Birdtrack and Birdlasser, with more coming soon. If you want to move your records to another platform, you are free to export all of your sightings from Birda.LIFE LISTSBirda automatically creates life lists of all the birds you've imported or recorded on Birda. Birda automatically generates sub-level lists based on time and geographic location. For example, you can see all your bird ticks for the last month or year and your home and patch lists (regions, countries, states/provinces & nature reserves coming soon!).TAXONOMYWe understand that taxonomy can be complicated! This is especially true when people are trying to compare species across taxonomic authorities. For this reason, we built an industry-first solution to simplify taxonomy for our users. Our taxonomic engine makes taxonomy seamless, allowing users to view each other’s bird sightings in their taxonomy of choice, irrespective of what is being used by other users.PRIVACYYou can choose to create a privacy zone around your address to hide the location of your garden sightings. Set up your home location, and Birda will also automatically create Home Lists and Patch lists for all the sightings you post within your Home and Patch boundaries. You have full control over what posts and GPS coordinates you share with others on Birda.Privacy Policy: https://birda.org/privacy/Terms & Conditions: https://birda.org/terms/

Allrighty, vad kan du göra i appen?BYGG UPP DIN TRÄDGÅRD - SÅ ATT DU KAN HA DEN I FICKAN HELA TIDENBörja med att skapa din trädgård och lägg upp dina olika växtplatser. Du kan lägga in förutsättningar för platsen och alla dina växter från vår växtbank. Här kan du hålla koll på vad du har i din trädgård, lägga in bilder och dela trädgården med vänner. Vet du inte vilken växt du har - inga problem Oh!Gardens växtidentifiering hjälper dig att identifiera växten. Fotografera växten och du får veta vilken det är.DIN DIGITALA VÄXTDAGBOKFölj din odling och trädgård genom åren. I den digitala trädgårdsdagboken kan du anteckna och lägga till bilder. På växtens tidslinje kan du följa växten över åren, med alla aktiviteter och inlägg du gör.VÄNNER & FORUMKika in hos vänner och följ vad som sker i deras trädgårdar! Hur har andra i din zon planterat och vilka växter har de? Passa på att hjärta vänners inlägg och spara ner växter som du ser hos andra. Du kan också ställa frågor till vänner i vårt härliga trädgårdsforum.FÅ HJÄLP - PÅ ETT BUSENKELT SÄTTVi hjälper dig med vilken växtzon du har och när det sista frostdatumet brukar vara. Så att du kan planera din odling och hålla koll. Lägger du in växtplatsens läge och förutsättningar så hojtar vi om det är så att växterna vanligtvis inte brukar trivas. Vill du ha hjälp att identifiera växter - ta ett foto och vår Växtidentifiering hjälper dig.SKAPA DINA LISTORDu kan skapa dina egna inköpslistor och listor över växter du kanske slängt på komposten. Du får också en automatisk gilla-lista när du gillar växter i appen.UPPTÄCK VÅR VÄXTBANK & INSPIRERAS AV ANDRAI vår växtbank, med över 16.000 växtporträtt, kan du inspireras av veckans växter och kombinationer. Du kan också se populära växter och få anpassade förslag och listor just för dig. Hittar du inte din växt, lägg till en egen. Du får ett pushmeddelande när vi lagt upp den i vår växtbank.KALENDERVår smarta kalender säger till dig vad som ska göras och när. Den utgår från de växter du lagt till på dina växtplatser och din trädgårds läge. Du får också ett supersmart planeringsverktyg och blomning- och skördescheman. Här kan du också lägga upp din trädgårdsskiss.VI GÖR DET TILLSAMMANS!Vi som har byggt den här appen har skapat appen vi själva behövde och vi hoppas att du vill vara med och hjälpa oss skapa världens bästa trädgårdsapp! Vi är ett litet företag, med stora ambitioner, och vi vill veta vad du tycker! Vi har därför gjort det enkelt att lämna förslag på förbättringar och vi hoppas att vi tillsammans kan bygga upp en riktigt bra Växtbank med information och bilder. Hjälp därför andra trädgårdsvänner genom att lägga upp dina bilder och förslag!Läs mer in Privacy Policy https://www.ohgarden.se/privacy och Terms of Service https://www.ohgarden.se/termsofservice

All in one Calibre libraries on your iPhones and iPads. Now equipped with Full text search feature and Multilingual User Interface!Lifetime support, no extra charge, no subscription fee.Calibre Sync can:- help you access full Calibre libraries on most popular personal cloud services, including Google Drive, Dropbox, Microsoft OneDrive, Box, pCloud, MEGA, iCloud, WebDav, Nextcloud and OwnCloud - simply the most supported for cloud services.- transform your device to a smart device emulator that connects to Calibre wirelessly. It even supports Calibre libraries on your external storage and from Calibre Content Server or Calibre-web with amazing performance.Move your Calibre libraries to your favourite cloud providers and access those libraries via Calibre Sync to browse, sort, search, download and read books on your device. Calibre Sync also supports multiple libraries across multiple Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, Box, pCloud, MEGA, iCloud, WebDav, Nextcloud, and OwnCloud accounts simultaneously.Features:- Unlimited Calibre libraries- Wireless connect to Calibre effortlessly as Smart device- Easy switch between multiple libraries across multiple accounts- Automatic check and update libraries when launching the app- Pull, Refresh or Remove a library from Calibre Sync- Support different book list layouts: List - detailed and simple, Grid, and Carousel- View your library statistics- Send books to Kindle with ease- Search across all of your available libraries- Search books by title, authors, and even in comments and custom columns- Filter books on authors, series, tags, language, publishers, formats and in custom columns- Sort libraries by title, author, ratings, and several Date options - ascending and descending- Filter downloaded books- Configuration for each library download location- Support for custom columns in book details view- Quick access to book download and share via slideable list view- Zoom the book cover- Support "swipe from book to book" in book details view- Email or share a copy of downloaded book- Open downloaded book in your book reader application to read a book- View the file size of each book format- Show book identifiers and link to source (like ISBN, Amazon, Google Books, Goodreads, etc)- Dark/light themes- And many more features...To move your Calibre library to cloud services:1) Open Calibre on your Laptop/PC/Desktop2) Select "Switch/create library..." from the Calibre menu3) Select an empty folder on your Cloud drive in "New Location" drop down4) Select "Move current library to new location", then press OK5) Wait for cloud sync to complete.6) Then you are ready to use Calibre Sync.To move your Calibre library to your phone storage, just copy the library directory to your phone storage.Notes:- Calibre Sync is not a reader app. You must install and use one of the many excellent reader apps available.- Only Microsoft OneDrive for Personal accounts (shared) are supported. Please email us if you observe any inconsistencies.- Due to restriction in Box API, Calibre Sync must acquire write permission in order to download files, download is not a read action on Box. Calibre Sync guarantees that it will not perform any write actions against your data in Box cloud account.- Calibre Sync use WebDav API of Nextcloud and OwnCloud services, and it requires case sensitive file system to work properly. Therefore, you must make sure that your libraries are set up on case sensitive file system (Linux, recent MacOS, Windows NTFS with case sensitive enabled).Please leave your reviews and suggestions to help us improve the app. For more information see https://calibresync.bitbucket.ioCalibre is © Kovid Goyal - calibre-ebook.comDrive is © Google LLC.Dropbox is © Dropbox inc.OneDrive is © MicrosoftBox is © Box inc.pCloud is © pCloud AGNextcloud is © Nextcloud GmbHOwnCloud is © OwnCloudMEGA is © MEGAiCloud is © Apple Inc

Do you need GPS NMEA location data for your computer or other device - maybe to use some mapping or navigation software?Until now, you couldn't get external access to the GPS inside your iPhone or iPad, but now with GPS2IP you can stream the information in realtime to solve your requirements.BEWARE - GPS2IP is *not* able to be used for the Apple turn-by-turn navigation app, or Google Maps, or most car navigation programs.It is designed for enthusiasts, or more sophisticated navigation software that can use an external wireless GPS unit. If you aren't sure what NMEA is, please check the website before buying.This is a rather special piece of software, and must be used in the right system. PLEASE CHECK THE WEBSITE: www.capsicumdreams.com/iPhone/gps2ip/We have a free version "GPS2IP Lite" that has most of the same features, so that you can try it out for free.Have a look on our website: http://capsicumdreams.com/gps2ip/differences.phpTry it for free, and only buy this full-featured version if it does what you need!The iPhone becomes a GPS server, and to get the information, you just connect to your iPhone using either wifi or Bluetooth LE.Alternatively, you can also push the NMEA data to any online server, using either TCP or UDP and process the information however you want.The TAIP protocol is also supported.Each device running GPS2IP can send a unique identifier, so that if you have multiple devices you can determine which device is sending what messages.GPS2IP now can be configured to restart automatically after your iOS device restarts, so you'll always keep track of your position.Apart from navigation software, other methods for connection include telnet or netcat, or many terminal programs.Some navigation software such as MacEnc can read from an IP address natively.Setting up a connection between MacEnc and GPS2IP is easy.Just have a look at the capsicumDreams website!http://capsicumdreams.com/gps2ip/Different NMEA messages can be selected for transmission according to your requirements.One non-standard message that GPS2IP transmits that is very useful for sailing is $PASHR.GPS 2 IP can run when the iPhone sleeps to support constant location reporting, but be aware that continued use of the GPS when running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.If your device dies or you turn it off when it was running, GPS2IP now automatically resumes sending the location. Beware that this will decrease battery life - we recommend keeping it charging if possible.GPS2IP can also be configured to output data at a selectable frequency (for example once every minute).You can lock the settings, so that no unauthorised people can change the settings.Lots more information and instructions on usage can be found on our website. Enjoy!

From RGB and Hex to CMYK, HSL, LAB, HSV, and XYZ, Cone offers a spectrum of possibilities.4. Color Harmonies: Uncover the relationships between colors. Discover complementary, analogous, and more harmony patterns, enhancing your design process.5. Personal Color Library: Capture and store colors that inspire you. Whether cataloging real-world inspirations or manually adding via hex codes, your library reflects your design journey.6. Gallery Color Picking: Tap into your gallery and extract colors from photos.7. Bucket Organization & Exports: Organize your colors into buckets and export them as beautifully laid-out palettes.8. Manual Color Accuracy: Adjust colors in challenging light conditions. Combined with the built-in torch mode, Cone ensures accuracy even in tricky environments.9. Freeze Frame: Are the colors on move? Instantly freeze the frame and pick colors in your own time.10. Colorblind Mode: This mode toggles the color names in the live preview to show simplified names like Blue, Green, Red, etc instead of names like Brandy Rose to make it easy for Colorblind people to identify colors.11. Quick Code Copy: Copy color codes with a single tap and bring them into other design tools.With Cone, you're equipped with a comprehensive toolkit tailored for designers who seek perfection.---You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. THE BEST VIDEO REPLAY APP!- Number 1 in the Sports iPad Category!!!- Trusted by the US major league baseball and basketball teams.- Perfect for golf players.Are you frustrated by making the same mistakes and wasting time on your practice? Video Delay Instant Replay is a fantastic way for athletes to receive instant feedback on their performance. Analyze your form, build good muscle memory, and get faster results. Make every practice satisfying and effective!There are three main features: the DELAY, the SLO-MO, and the REPLAY.The DELAY Mode continuously shows the delayed video during practice. After setting the buffer time, there's no need to record and replay manually. The video feedback will be on until you reset the buffer or hit the exit button.The SLO-MO Mode captures a short video and instantly replays it in slow motion. It works best for quick activities, like punch or shoot. To adjust the speed rate, use the slider. The recording will get you short slow-motion videos of every repetition. The REPLAY View* allows frame-by-frame analysis of athlete moves, including measuring the angles. You can also export a short part of the replay video using AB selection.* It works only with Delay mode and a buffer time longer than 1 second.Improve your skills and get faster results:1. Set the Buffer time.2. Do your action.3. Watch the video feedback.4. Immediately correct your posture and repeat!Coaches and teachers! Use the app with an external screen for even better feedback during practice! Watch the Replay video with your team, analyze your players' performance, and correct errors. Add lines on the screen to check out the angles. Trim the video, so it only shows what you want your students to concentrate on. Record only necessary parts of the practice. Instant Feedback also helps to settle disputes between players.Basketball, baseball, and football players! Practice by repetition -  improve your shooting form by copying your favorite players' moves. Make out the best of your hitting drill. Take a quick look at the footage, correct your posture, and return to the action. No need to rewind or touch the device; the video will play instantly. You will be able to see if your pose is good and if your fake moves are effective. Golf and tennis players! Use a motion-detection grid and correct your swing or backhand instantly! Perform proper movements and maintain good posture while exercising. Build better muscle memory and improve your game!Training martial arts, archery, or shooting? Study your form with delayed video feedback. Set a short delay time and analyze your moves in slow motion. See what to correct in your kicks or punches.Pilates or yoga fan? Check out poses you won’t see in the mirror, like dog or pigeon. Make sure you are true to form and protect yourself from injury.Actors and performers!Replay yourself performing and improve your acting skills. Check out your gestures in slow-motion and make them the best!For information on how to use the VDIR, please check out the User Guide in the app!

Panchang which is also known as Panchangam is used to denote five elements of Vedic Astrology, namely Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana and Var i.e. weekday. These five elements when combined for a day are known as Panchang. These five elements change every day with the movement of the Moon and the Sun. Hence, followers of Hinduism refer Panchangam on day to day basis. Panchang is also known as Hindu Calendar.Drik Panchang is one of the most reputed Panchangam available on Internet. It has been made available for iOS devices with similar features and precision as that of www.DrikPanchang.com This native Panchang, which doesn't need Internet connectivity to use, comes with following featuresGrid Calendar - The grid can be customized for lunar calendar. Lunar calendars can be customized by selecting Purnimanta and Amanta option and by selecting Vikrama Samvata, Shaka Samvata and Gujarati Samvata options. These selections can convert a lunar calendar into a Gujarati Panchang, Telugu Panchanga or Kannada Panchangam.Festivals - Drik Panchang is the most comprehensive source which lists most Hindu and Indian festivals, Government Holidays, Jayanti, fasting days including Ekadashi, Sankashti, Pradosham, Purnima, Sankranti, Durgashtami and Shivaratri days for each month. Drik Panchang lists all Chandra Grahan and Surya Grahan dates in the year.Kundali Support - Drik Panchang comes with Kundali support and it can generate Lagna Kundali for any date, time and location. For Lagna Kundali it shows detailed planetary position for Sun, Moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Saturn, Rahu, Ketu, True Rahu, True Ketu, Uranus, Neptune and Pluto. The Kundali can be drawn either in North Indian or South Indian chart format. Dainika Panchangam - Apart from listing five basic elements of Panchangam, detailed Dainika Panchang highlights Panchaka, Ganda Moola, Bhadra, Vinchudo and all auspicious Yoga including Ravi, Amrita, Sarvartha Siddhi, Tripushkara, Dwipushkara, Ravi Pushya and Guru Pushya for each day.Dainika Panchangam also lists Abhijit Muhurta, Amrit Kalam, Rahu Kalam, Gulikai Kalam, Yamaganda, Dur Muhurtam, Varjyam and Anandadi Yoga.Muhurta Table - Drik Panchang comes with day and night Choghadiya, Shubh Horai and Udaya Lagna. Each running Muhurta is shown with count down timer.Horoscope Match - App can be used to match two horoscopes based on Ashta Kuta.Localization - App supports Hindi as well as English as the default language.Location - Panchang can be generated for any location and city across the globe to get correct date for Upavasa and festivals. App comes with in-built DST support and there is no need to adjust timings for DST.In App Purchase - You can remove the Ads by using the following subscriptions:-- Remove Ads for 1 month at ₹19 with auto-renewable subscription: You will enjoy the complete ads free Drik Panchang app for 1 month or until you cancel the subscription within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.- Remove Ads for 1 year at ₹199 with auto-renewable subscription: You will enjoy the complete ads free Drik Panchang app for 1 year or until you cancel the subscription within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.Points to remember:• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.Terms of use:- https://www.drikpanchang.com/contactus/privacy-policy/app/dp-apps-terms-and-conditions.html

Easy Pose is a human body pose app for people who draw or is learning to draw. Have you ever wanted a personalized model to show various poses while drawing animation, illustration or sketching? Easy Pose was developed for these people. Various angles of different poses can be inspected. Now you do not have to draw with a wooden joint doll or figure as a model. Even yoga or exercise poses can be checked from various angles.1. Sensitive Operation – Easy Pose allows control over the main joints in an amazingly smooth manner. It provides multiple functions previously unavailable in other pose apps such as a highlight on movable parts, initialization of joints and manipulation state, and finding a symmetrical pose with the mirroring function. Experience controls that are more convenient than with a mouse.2. Comic Style Models – Previous pose apps had many realistic eight-head ratio men and women, making it unsuitable for animation, webtoon or game illustrations. Easy Pose is prepared with models with various body types.3. Multi-Model Control – A scene can be made with a made with a maximum of 6 people at once! It is now possible to make a scene of a soccer player avoiding a tackle or a couple holding hands and dancing.4. Tens of poses that have already been completed. Poses that are used often are already made. About 60 poses have been prepared and these poses will be regularly updated.5. Other Characteristics- Sensitive light expression using direct and backlight settings- Able to observe various poses at various angles- Realistic shadows such as shadows of models being cast over other models- Able to change the angle of view (possible to use an exaggerated vanishing point such as a panorama)- Provides a wire mode that allows lines drawn over models- Able to download models without the background in a PNG clear background.- Automatic saving, making it safe whenever there is a device error.- Able to easily control hand movements.6. Functions Provided in the Free Version- Model poses can be freely controlled.- Moods can be freely controlled by controlling the light angle.- Able to save the image in PNG. Use it when using Easy Pose with another program to draw!- A scene can be made by freely controlling the camera distance7. Paid Version Upgrade Benefit- Completed poses can be saved and recalled.- A woman (normal), woman (small), man (small) is provided other than the original model.- Several models can be brought on screen at once.- There are no ads.- All “Completed Poses” can be used.** Since the data is not saved to server, when you delete an app, the saved data is also deleted.** when you delete Pro version and re-install it, click "purchase Pro version" in the app again to complete installation.

This is Barre Body, your online workout portal and the fastest way to feel good. Fun fact: feeling good is the reason why we move. We don’t care about looking a particular way. Abs shmabs. We care about listening to our bodies, and resting when we need to. About loving our bodies, even on days we don’t particularly like them. We care about showing up, sweating it out, and shaking it off. And doing arm workouts even if it’s just to help make IKEA flatpacks easier. Because a barre body isn’t a bikini body, or a beach body, or a ballet body. It’s your body. It’s our body. And it’s for every body. So, what’s up with the app?It features hundreds of workouts taught by expert instructors to suit all fitness levels, ranging from short 10-minute sessions to intense 60-minute classes. These include Barre, Pilates, Reformer, Power Pilates, Tone, Sculpt, Flow, Dance Cardio, Cardio, HIIT, Vinyasa, Yin, Stretch classes. And with all your workouts conveniently in your pocket, you can move anytime, anywhere—at home, in the park, on your sun-soaked balcony, or even on your vacation in Sicily. It’s not just one-off classes, either. We’ve created targeted programs that get you burning and are actually fun to do. Like Barre Body Basics, Barre for Runners, Perfect Your Posture, Splits Series, Glutes Program, Turn Up The HIIT, & Ballet Workshops. And if you’re pregnant? Congratulations! We have premium prenatal content made exclusively for baby mamas, by people who have been there themselves—more than once.With new classes dropping each week, you’ll always find a fresh way to feel good. Filter by class length, class style, and even by your favourite instructor. (We’ve all got one.) And if you’ve ever thought “ugh, I wish someone could just tell me what workouts to do”, we’ve thought of you too. Follow our monthly planner and never wonder what workout to do on a random Tuesday, ever again. Please note, this is an auto-renewable subscription. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account once you’ve confirmed your purchase. Your account will be charged for renewable within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase.Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription. Love the fine print? OLY Be c’est l’application mobile numéro 1 pour pratiquer les activités sportives & bien-être comme le Yoga, le Pilates ou la Méditation. OLY Be ce sont des milliers de cours chaque mois en salle ou en ligne : 7 jours sur 7, de 7h30 à 21h30. Vous pourrez donc trouver LE cours qui vous convient, juste à côté de chez vous ou de votre bureau mais aussi en ligne ! Le temps de trajet pour vous rendre à votre cours de Yoga ou de Pilates ne sera plus une excuse ! En plus OLY Be propose ses cours à petits prix, à partir de 8€. Les cours sont adaptés à tous, quel que soit votre niveau.Grâce à l’application OLY Be, visualisez le planning des cours, réservez celui de votre choix et payez en ligne. En 2 clics à partir de votre smartphone réservez un cours de Yoga dynamique ou plus doux, ou encore de Pilates, de renforcement musculaire et de sophrologie.OLY Be propose différents type de cours : du yoga dynamique comme du Vinyasa, du Jivamukti, du yoga plus doux comme le Hatha ou le Yoga Recharge, voire carrément cocooning comme le Yin. Il y a aussi des cours de Yoga Kundalini et de Yoga prénatal ! D’autres pratiques sportives douces (ou moins douces) sont également au programme : pilates, stretching, sophrologie, barre au sol mais aussi bootcamp, danse…Tous nos cours sont donnés par des professeurs certifiés, testés et sélectionnés par nos soins ! Les cours OLY Be se déroulent dans une ambiance détendue et bienveillante, au sein d’une communauté motivante, dans des centaines de lieux différents !OLY Be c’est une application qui vous fera gagner un temps précieux en vous permettant de pratiquer vos activités préférées simplement, et à un tarif abordable, en salle ou en ligne !Une pratique régulière de yoga ou d’une autre discipline sportive bien-être permet de se détendre en profondeur, d’être en meilleure santé, moins stressé et de mieux dormir !Cette nouvelle version de l’application permet de réserver à Paris et Lyon ainsi que tous nos cours en ligne et en live !

From Meditation to Relationships, Family to Environmental Tips, Yoga and Meditation to Travel and Recipes—we cover all the issues and topics that matter with a sense of humor and journalistic integrity—cutting through fads and making fun of spiritual materialism.Our app is simple: it’s not here to clutter your life, but to help open it up. Most apps we enjoy fill the gaps in our lives—whether in line or in a waiting room, or at a restaurant waiting for a friend or colleague to return. Elephant offers space and inspiration within this busyness, enabling us to return to our basic goodness with knowledge and empathy.Every day, check our Front Page for uplifted discussions and new articles, videos and podcasts. Then, your reading, hearting, sharing, and commenting directly increase the article's score, helping that author “win,” get paid by our mindful community, and get featured on our Front Page.FRONT PAGE: A clear scrollable display of our community’s favorite articles, timely issues, and editor’s picks. Scroll ’til you find something that inspires you.TOPICS: Browse articles by category (Yoga, Family, Green, Politics, Recipes…), bookmark those you love, and snooze the ones you don’t.NOTIFICATIONS: See if someone replies to your comment, get alerts from writers who you follow, and find our best new articles.SEARCH: Find that article or subject you’re curious about, and see other trending searchesHEART: Tap the “heart” icon on your favorite articles to boost their score to help the issue get featured on our Front Page and increase the author’s chances of winning our weekly Ecosystem payout.COMMENT: Join the uplifted discussions happening on each story to increase the article’s score and create mindful community.  SHARE: Share your favorite articles with your network, directly from the app.SUBSCRIBE: You can read two articles free, every day—if you want to read unlimited articles, and see fewer ads, you can subscribe for $3/month (billed annually at $36/year). You can cancel your renewal at any time from the Account Settings of your device at least 24 hours before your renewal date.Questions? Feedback? Confused? Contact our Support at: elephantjournal.com/supportWe respect your Privacy: elephantjournal.com/privacyElephant’s Terms of Service: elephantjournal.com/terms-of-service/

Ontspan gemakkelijk, altijd en overal op een ongekend diep niveau met House of Deeprelax, de eerste en meest complete nederlandstalige Yoga Nidra app. Deze, op slaap gebaseerde, diep herstellende meditatie, is de fijnste en snelste weg naar o.a. een diepe herstellende slaap en het loslaten van stress. Elke sessie is een uniek ingesproken meditatieve reis, begeleid door zelfontworpen muziek met binaural beats. Na elke sessie voel je je als herboren met minder angst of gepieker en met nieuwe energie en focus.Of je nu beginner of gevorderd bent, met Deeprelax is het mogelijk om diep te ontspannen waar en wanneer je maar wilt. In de vorm van een kort ochtendritueel, een powernap tussendoor of juist tijdens een heerlijke, extra lange avondsessie. Compleet met een offline functie. Elke sessie heeft een uniek thema, variërend van 14 tot 50 minuten, ontworpen en ingesproken door Eliane Bernhard.Verander je leven met Yoga NidraYoga Nidra is voor veel mensen de beste ontdekking om te ontspannen en beter te slapen. Yoga Nidra is een wetenschappelijk en effectief bewezen, diepherstellende, geleide meditatie op basis van slaap. Of het voor jou nu uitsluitend gaat om diep te ontspannen of juist om je leven te veranderen, iedereen heeft baat bij deze fijne methode. Kom lekker liggen (gemakkelijk in je bed,op de bank of zelfs in een vliegtuigstoel) en luister naar een fijne stem die je meeneemt op de mooiste reizen. Elke Deeprelax Yoga Nidra sessie bestaat uit:Een mix van meerdere Yoga Nidra stromingen, afgestemd op de behoeften van de moderne mens. Dit zijn: - Ademhalingsoefeningen- Ontspannings- en bewustzijnstechnieken- Gecombineerd met hypnose en bijzondere visualisaties De Deeprelax Methode is ontwikkeld door meditatie-expert Eliane Bernhard. Het is een samengestelde mix van meerdere Yoga Nidra stromingen afgestemd op de behoeften van de moderne mens en met prachtige resultaten getest op duizenden mensen.Deeprelax Yoga Nidra ook voor jou!Op welk punt je je op dit moment ook in je leven bevindt, deze bijzondere geleide meditatie is op alle gebieden een gemakkelijke en krachtige ondersteuning:- Nieuwe dimensie van rust- Alternatief voor slaapmedicatie- Direct meer energie- Verlichting bij een ziekte- Instant verlichting bij angst of pijn - Natuurlijke antidepressiva- Ontspanning en creativiteit op het werk- Verlicht PMS-klachten- Verlichting bij reumaklachten - Gemakkelijk contact met je intuïtieWat houdt een premium abonnement in:Onbeperkt ToegangLuister onbeperkt en op elk gewenst moment naar jouw favoriete Deeprelax Sessie, zowel online als offline. Exclusieve InhoudRegelmatig komt er een gloednieuwe Deeprelax Yoga Nidra Serie online. Deze afleveringen zijn exclusief ontworpen en voorzien van zelfgecomponeerde muziek met binaural beats. Voor Elk MomentIn de vorm van een kort ochtendritueel, een powernap tussendoor of juist tijdens een heerlijke, extra lange avondsessie. We hebben de sessies onderverdeeld in 4 momenten: Morning Ritual, First Aid, Relax en Good Night. Elk moment bevat meerdere sessies variërend van 14 tot 50 minuten. Jouw lidmaatschap bestaat o.a. uit onbeperkt toegang tot alle Deeprelax Slaap Meditatie Sessies. Gedurende je lidmaatschap kun je deze series onbeperkt blijven luisteren. Regelmatig komen er nieuwe Deeprelax Yoga Nidra series bij. Beoordeel onze app in de Appstore en schrijf een review, zodat we nog betere ontspanning voor iedereen mogelijk kunnen maken.Onze gebruikersvoorwaarden vind je hier:https://houseofdeeprelax.com/terms-conditions/Hoe we omgaan met jouw persoonsgegevens lees je in ons privacy-policy:https://houseofdeeprelax.com/privacy-policy/

When developing Gym Tracker, I paid special attention to minimalism. As a result, I got a fully functional workout tracker, which works completely offline and has no extra functions at all. The interface is so intuitive that it is impossible to get lost. I’ve honestly tried my best to make it nice & simple!The app is great for both gym and at home workout, because the list of exercises is created by you. Instead of hundreds of preset workout programs (invented by nobody knows who), you form your own database - leave only what is important for you personally. ‣ Create any exercise: from yoga to strength training.‣ Customize them: workout with dumbbells, barbells or with your own weight.‣ Log your results in a few clicks.‣ Keep track of your progress: stay toned, gain or lose weight. Together with other users who regularly write great reviews, we strive to keep the app simple. As a result, as many superfluous elements as possible have been eliminated from the app, but functionality has been retained. However, if you do miss something, you can always contact me directly from the app and I will try to implement your ideas.The only limitation of the free version is the maximum amount of 8 workouts. You can ignore this limit by deleting old workouts, or remove the restriction completely with a premium subscription at a reasonable price. This kind of support, as well as honest feedback, helps me grow the project. I promise, I do not and will not have any advertising and unnecessary purchases. Everything is extremely transparent. I am using it myself, so I do not want to make another Frankenstein out of the app.Policy: http://gymtracker.tilda.ws/privacy-policyTerms and Conditions: http://gymtracker.tilda.ws/terms-of-useThank you for reading to the end, so it was not in vain!

Aplikacja "FitAnka: Trening w Domu dla Kobiet Dieta Bieganie" to największa w Polsce aplikacja sportowa zawierająca setki ćwiczeń, ponad 350 treningów dla początkujących i zaawansowanych kobiet na różne partie ciała, zdrowe przepisy (ponad 3000), moduł bieganie oraz dziesiątki wyzwań sportowych.Najważniejsze funkcje:• Treningi na różne partie ciała razem z rozgrzewką i rozciąganiem.• Ćwiczenia przyjazne dla kobiet w ciąży, mam oraz osób początkujących jak i otyłych.• Specjalistyczne treningi na przykład: Rozejście mięśnia prostego brzucha.• Ekran statystyk, zapisywanie postępów Twoich treningów, spalonych kalorii, zjedzonych posiłków i przebiegniętych kilometrów.• Szczegółowe treningi wideo z dokładnym omówieniem ćwiczeń. Trenujesz równo ze mną a ja odliczam powtórzenia i czas do końca treningu.• Dziel się swoimi osiągnięciami w mediach społecznościowych• Prowadzę Cię krop po kroku w wyzwaniach sportowych.Najważniejsze moduły w aplikacji:Moduł treningi przygotowałam dla Ciebie pełne treningi i ćwiczenia nagrane w jakości HD na różne partie ciała, w których pomagam osiągnąć ci Twoje wymarzone cele. Najpopularniejsze treningi to:• Ćwiczenia na plaski brzuch, cellulit, trening abs• Pilates• Ćwiczenia pośladków• Interwały, tabata, hiit• Streaching i Joga• Ćwiczenia brzucha• Moduł  wyzwania są HITEM na FitAnka – czyli gotowe plany treningowe "dzień po dniu". Decydując się na podjęcie WyzwAnia zapewnisz sobie komfort, gdyż będziesz prowadzona „krok po kroku”, a dzięki możliwości "odhaczania" wykonanych przez Ciebie treningów widzisz Twój prawdziwy postęp. Jest w czym wybierać: ponad 40 różnych WyzwAń z podziałem na czas trwania, części ciała i sprzęt. Wystarczy tylko Twoja decyzja by ruszyć z kopyta - resztę zrobi za Ciebie FitAnka. • Moduł bieganie zawiera GPS z komendami głosowymi w którym Anka Dziedzic prowadzi Cię tak jakby biegła obok. Licz przebiegnięte kilometry i spalone kalorie, zobacz podsumowanie przebytej trasy na mapie w podsumowaniu Twojego biegu.• Moduł dieta - Ponad 3000 smacznych, specjalnie wyselekcjonowanych i zdrowych przepisów, które pomogą ci w utrzymaniu prawidłowej diety i sylwetki. Skoro 70% sukcesu w pracy nad figurą i sylwetką to dieta, to ta funkcjonalność na FitAnka to prawdziwa PETARDA!!! Przede wszystkim obliczysz tutaj Twoje dzienne zapotrzebowanie kaloryczne, dzięki czemu ułożysz sobie dietę redukcyjną, utrzymującą bądź przybierającą „na masę”. Wybierzesz sobie rodzaj posiłków (ustawisz „ulubione”), wyznaczysz ile posiłków dziennie chcesz spożywać, wyeliminujesz te składniki, których nie lubisz. Ułożysz sobie jadłospis zawierający posiłki bez tego, czego nie możesz spożywać, np. bez glutenu czy bez laktozy. Wypróbujesz dietę oczyszczającą. Pamiętaj w aplikacji FitAnka znajdziesz ponad 3000 przepisów! Polityka prywatności:https://www.fitanka.pl/polityka-prywatnosci-m/Do zobaczenia na macie!Anka Dziedzic - FitAnka

Het BOOST! Framework is opgebouwd uit drie pilaren:FOOD: Gezond eten made easy (verrrry easy!)-Weekmenu's met de beste seizoensgerechtjes op maat van jouw gezin (of je nu wel of niet vegi of vega bent).-Een handig zelf samengesteld boodschappenlijstje op maat van jouw noden en allergieën.-Toegang tot een professioneel samengestelde producten database met BOOST!-approved keuzes per winkel (byebye, keuzestress!).-De lekkerste recepten voor ontbijt, lunch en diner.-Educatieve video's met alles wat je moet weten over voedingBODY: Bewegen made fun (verrrrry fun!)-Beweeg op maat van jouw leven en body: weinig tijd of net zin in een lekker lange workout? We've got ya!-Eventjes niet gesport of sportyspice for the win? Keuze voor iedereen!-De leukste workoutvideo's (yoga, pilates, hiit) voor thuis en de beste loop- en fitnesschema's op jouw maat.MIND: Zelfvertrouwen on point (verrrrry on point!)-Twijfel je aan jezelf? Denk je dat alleen sla eten the way to go is? Heb je elk dieet uitgeprobeerd? Ben jij een stresskip? Denk je vaak negatief over jezelf? NO MORE! We leren je van jezelf houden, zoals je bent. You deserve some selflove girl! Gudrun Hespel is klinisch psycholoog en personal coach (https://the-fittest-you.com/).Celien Rombouts is diëtiste (https://healthyhabitscelien.be/).Samen zijn ze de drijvende kracht achter Boost! en zorgen ze voor de meest up-to-date content. De informatie in deze app kan niet gezien worden als een vervanging voor medische of andere professionele hulp. Gebruikers worden aangeraden om medische vragen, klachten of symptomen tijdig voor te leggen aan hun behandelende arts of andere zorgprofessional teneinde professioneel onderzoek, diagnostiek en mogelijk medische zorg te ontvangen.De algemene voorwaarden kunnen hier nagelezen worden: https://getyourboost.be/algemene-voorwaarden/

IGNITE:Plan Includes:The full program includes access to everything! You asked, I am delivering! A blueprint mapped out for you, all you have to do is show up and follow along. You will have access to:Before You Get Started Education + Resources12 Months of Progressive Strength TrainingFunctional Training, Pilates + HIITHeart Rate Based Cardio ProgramsOn Demand Classes To Take At Your Convenience100+ Anytime/Post Workout RecipesNutritional GuidelinesAccountability Group To Keep You MotivatedClass Option:For the fitness enthusiasts who prefer "follow-along" style, our on-demand class library offers a wide array of workouts, from AMRAP and HIIT to Pilates, Tone & Sculpt, Cardio Blitz, and Foam Rolling. You have access to take anywhere, anytime. All you have to do is press play! How It Works: This progressive program is designed to teach you how to train more efficiently and effectively. Maximize your time in the gym/at home, let your heart rate call the shots and move at your own speed. This all in one program ecompasses strength training, heart rate based cardio programs, Pilates, and HIIT! It is designed to simulate having a personal trainer in your back pocket telling you exactly what to do every single day. Once you start your FREE 7 DAY TRIAL you will see there are four different modules inside of the app - IGNITE, BURN, BLAZE and TORCH. Each one consists of 3 months/3 levels of training. It is designed to be completed in order so that you advance with your workouts free from burnout or injury. As you will see the exercises naturally progress week after week and month after month. Your reps, sets, tempo and intensity changes so that you continue to see results and build lean body mass. The beauty of it all is that once you finish it you can restart the program using heavier weights. Where do I start?Beginners - start at IGNITE LEVEL 1Experienced - start at IGNITE LEVEL 3I am so excited to work with you! Have a question? Email me at support@brooketaylorfit.com.

Styrk din krop, dit sind og din sjæl med Cathrine Yoga app’en – dit selvkærlige redskab til mere ro i sindet, selvaccept og kernestyrke. Med denne gratis app får du adgang til udvalgte yogavideoer og meditationer, der tager dig på en indre opdagelsesrejse. Træk dagens selvkærlige mantrakort og skab nye, positive forandringer i dit liv, eller gå på opdagelse blandt et hav af sunde, velsmagende opskrifter, som nærer kroppen indefra.ONLINE YOGADyrk hjemmeyoga, når det passer dig. App'en giver dig gratis adgang til 5 udvalgte yogavideoer, der tager dig på en indre opdagelsesrejse i sindet, mens du strækker din krop glad og i balance. Er du medlem af Cathrine Yoga, kan du logge ind og få adgang til 200+ yoga- og meditationsvideoer, yogakure, liveklasser og meget mere! Som medlem har du adgang til biblioteket over samtlige yogastillinger samt yogatemaer, og du kan gemme dine favoritvideoer og yndlingsstillinger. Yogabiblioteket består af yin yoga, yang yoga, gravid yoga og mindfulness meditationer, som er inddelt i 12 temaer; aftenyoga, begynderyoga, børneyoga, udrensning, grounding, hormoner i balance, morgenyoga, selvkærlighed, sov godt, sund og stærk, yoga for løbere samt yoga for mænd. Som medlem kan du downloade 5 yogavideoer til offline streaming, og du kan caste videoerne til dit TV. Er du tilmeldt en yogakur, så finder du ligeledes al indholdet i app’en. SUNDE OPSKRIFTERSpis dig glad og sund! Med Cathrine Yoga app’en får du masser af inspiration til lækre og sunde yogaopskrifter – fra morgenmad og frokost til aftenmad og de søde sager. Du kan gemme dine favoritopskrifter, så du altid har dem lige ved hånden.MANTRAKORTTræk dagens selvkærlige mantrakort. Lær at tiltrække alt det gode med støttende, selvaccepterende og styrkende budskaber. Det, du vælger at fokusere på, vil du nemlig få mere af.CATHRINE KOEFOEDKvinden bag Cathrineyoga.dk – Danmarks største yogaunivers, som inspirerer over 100.000 månedlige læsere. Med 60.000 følgere på SoMe og +35.000, som allerede har downloadet Cathrine Yoga app’en, er der ingen tvivl om, at Cathrine Koefoed er Danmarks største og mest anerkendte yogalærer. Hun er uddannet inden for yin, yang, gravid, hatha og vinyasa yoga samt mindfulness og meditation. Og så er hun skaberen af Cathrine Yoga Online – en selvkærlig medlemsklub med et evigt voksende yogabibliotek af yogavideoer og meditationer – samt af Cathrine Yoga Travel – et personligt rejsebureau, der arrangerer anmelderroste yogarejser i hele verden. Du er hjertens velkommen til at kontakte os på info@cathrineyoga.dk, hvis du har spørgsmål eller ønsker til Cathrine Yoga app’en. Vi ønsker dig en fantastisk rejse! Namasté Betingelser: https://cathrineyoga.dk/handelsbetingelser/Privatlivspolitik: https://cathrineyoga.dk/privatlivspolitik/

La multipremiada comunidad de estilo de vida de bienestar integral se renueva y ahora te ofrece más beneficios que nunca.  No soló nos enfocamos en el ejercicio sino en todo lo que engloba llegar a ser tu mejor versión. Con contenidos prácticos y variados, podrás trabajar en ti para sentirte fuerte, ágil y saludable. Ya sea que busques HIIT, Barre, Pilates, Fuerza o funcional, tenemos un programa para ti que buscas un estilo de vida saludable en todos los aspectos.En Fit by You somos una comunidad donde sus integrantes se sienten con el apoyo y motivación necesarios para cuidar de si mismos en todo sentido. No importa que sólo tengas unos minutos al día, tenemos algo para ti desde tips e información de expertos en cada rama hasta rutinas de ejercicio enfocadas a tus objetivos particulares.¿Y tú que esperas para hacer algo por ti hoy?TÉRMINOS Y PRECIOS DE SUSCRIPCIÓNFIT by You, es un app para llevar un estilo de vida saludable, NO ES UN APP MEDICA ni sustituye al tratamiento profesional para tratar condiciones de salud personales, consulta siempre a tu médico.  Puedes descargar FIT by You de manera gratuita. Sin embargo, para acceder a las clases y utilizar todas las funciones de la aplicación, se requiere una suscripción activa. Ofrecemos una gama amplia de opciones de suscripción donde podrás elegir la mas adecuada para ti. (mensual, trimestral, semestral que pueden incluir o no un periodo de prueba). Cada suscripción se facturará de manera automática al confirmar la compra a través de tu cuenta de iTunes. Los planes se renuevan automáticamente al finalizar el período, a menos que se cancele la renovación automática al menos 24 horas antes del final del período actual. Podrás gestionar tu suscripción y desactivar la renovación automática en cualquier momento desde la Configuración de la cuenta en iTunes. En caso de renovación, el precio se mantendrá. Una vez realizada la compra, no se ofrecerán reembolsos por períodos no utilizados.Para más detalles, consulta: Términos de uso: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/Aviso de privacidad : https://fitbyyou.com/aviso.phpTérminos de uso extendidos: https://fitbyyou.com/terminos.php

Tentang KaryaKarsaKaryaKarsa adalah Platform storyteller tempat fans dapat langsung mendukung kreator favorit mereka dengan kesinambungan finansial. Jadi, kreator bisa mendapatkan pendapatan bulanan langsung dari fans mereka untuk terus berkarya.Fitur KaryaKarsaGabung sebagai KreatorGRATIS daftar jadi kreator dan bisa langsung menawarkan karyamu ke fans. Dapatkan penghasilan dari penjualan karyamu tersebut. Semangat berkarya!Temukan Beragam KreatorTemukan kreator yang karyanya ingin kamu nikmati berdasarkan kategorinya. Mulai dari Penulis, Komikus & Ilustrator, Youtuber, Podcaster, Musisi sampai Edukasi & Tutorial.Dukung Karya dengan MudahBeli karya menggunakan Kakoin (KaryaKarsa koin).Baca Novel, Manga, dan Webtoon dari PonselKami juga telah mengoptimalkan novel dan manga webtoon untuk dibaca lewat ponsel. Kamu bisa mendapatkan pengalaman men-scroll novel dan komik tanpa terputus.Rekomendasi Karya Khusus KamuKaryaKarsa dilengkapi kecerdasan buatan yang dapat memberikan rekomendasi karya sesuai jenis-jenis karya yang sedang kamu gemari. Eksplor lebih jauh dan nikmati lebih banyak karya yang sesuai preferensimu.KaryaKarsa Untuk KreatorDapatkan dukungan dan apresiasi dari fans untuk setiap karya yang kamu terbitkan dalam bentuk digital. KaryaKarsa memfasilitasi kamu sebagai kreator untuk menawarkan karya dan mendapat dukungan langsung dari fans dan followers.Apapun hobi dan latar belakangmu, kamu bisa jadi kreator di KaryaKarsa!Kamu yang punya latar belakang penulis dan terbiasa menulis cerita dalam bentuk novel, cerbung, dan cerpen bisa menerbitkan tulisan-tulisanmu dengan mudah di KaryaKarsa. Dari genre romance, cerita horror, hingga komedi, karya-karya tulisan di KaryaKarsa sudah dapat banyak dukungan.Kamu yang memiliki kemampuan dalam hal seni gambar juga bisa menerbitkan karya webtoon, comic strip, tutorial menggambar, dan seni digital lainya.Senang ilmu fotografi? Kamu juga bisa kok membagikan tips-tips fotografi, menjual hasil fotomu, dan bahkan mendapatkan apresiasi dari setiap preset Lightroom yang kamu publikasikan di KaryaKarsa.Kalau kamu Youtuber, Gamer, Streamer, Cosplayer, atau Model yang memiliki karya digital, karya-karyamu juga bisa dipublikasikan di KaryaKarsa. Gabung menjadi kreator di KaryaKarsa sekarang, dan dapatkan penghasilan tambahan dari dukungan fans dan followers kamu.KaryaKarsa Untuk SupporterBagi penikmat karya, kamu langsung bisa mendapat karya dari kreator favorit sekaligus mendukungnya agar terus berkarya!Kamu bisa membaca komik lucu, novel romansa remaja, puisi, dan beragam bacaan lainnya dari kreator penulis cerita favoritmu. Kamu juga bisa ikutan kelas yoga dan gym, belajar tentang mental health, serta belajar banyak hal baru lainnya dari pakarnya langsung.Bukan cuma itu, kamu bahkan bisa mempercantik foto dengan preset Lightroom, dengerin lagu-lagu unik, dengerin podcast seru, belajar main musik, dan masih banyak lagi!Ikuti kreator favoritmu di KaryaKarsa, dan dapatkan notifikasi langsung setiap ada karya baru dari sang kreator. Cek platform storyteller KaryaKarsa sekarang!Kalau kamu punya pertanyaan atau saran, hubungi kami di media sosial ya!Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/karyakarsa_idTwitter: https://twitter.com/karyakarsa_idEmail: tanya@karyakarsa.com

Welcome to True Form Studio!Your at-home Pilates studio with LIVE & ON-DEMAND classes.Our workouts are designed to create lengthened and toned muscles without the bulk and focus on lateral breathing to reduce cortisol & inflammation in the body. Fitshaker je online fitko pre ženy, v ktorom nájdeš viac ako 1000 tréningových videí v 30+ programoch a výzvach - HIIT, Tabata, Yoga, Pilates, Sexybody a ďalšie. Vyskúšaj účinné online cvičenie na doma.Chceš pracovať na svojej postave, ale nechce sa ti chodiť do fitka? Ušetri si čas aj peniaze a dostaň sa do formy vo svojej obývačke s Fitshakerom!  Fitshaker aplikácia obsahuje kopec unikátnych vychytávok, vďaka ktorým budeš mať z cvičenia dokonalý zážitok. V čom je Fitshaker aplikácia na cvičenie jedinečná?Tréningy sú primárne s vlastným telom, takže nepotrebuješ fitness pomôcky.Stačí málo. Výsledky dosiahneš už od 15 minút denne.Všetky cvičenia sú v podaní slovenských a českých trénerov, takže ti nehrozí žiadna jazyková bariéra.Fitshaker si už vyskúšalo viac ako 60 000 žien, budeš tak súčasťou skvelej komunity.Cvičenie s nami bude tvoja každodenná nálož pozitívnej energie! :)Ako naša fitness aplikácia funguje? Po otvorení ťa čaká tréningové video na daný deň.Každý pokrok treba oceniť, a preto od nás vždy po odcvičení dostaneš pochvalu či motivačný tip.Ak sa ti tréning mimoriadne páčil, môžeš si ho uložiť do obľúbených a kedykoľvek sa k nemu vrátiť.Odcvičené video sa zaradí do kalendára, v ktorom uvidíš prehľad svojich aktivít.Aby sme ti pomohli vytvoriť si z cvičenia pravidelný návyk, budeme ťa motivovať povzbudivými notifikáciami.Vyskladaj si cvičko podľa seba: Na výber máš z 900 cvičebných videí vo viac než 30-tich programoch a výzvach. Môžeš si vybrať typ cvičenia, ktorý ti vyhovuje najviac alebo ich môžeš striedať podľa toho, na čo máš práve chuť. Čakajú ťa programy ako: HIIT, Tabata, Loca Dance, Aerobic, Toning interval, Sexy body, Yoga, Gravid Yoga, Pilates, Diastasis, Výzva do plaviek, Novoročná výzva a mnoho ďalšieho.Sú dni kedy vôbec nestíhaš a naopak dni, kedy máš chuť si dať viac do tela? U nás nájdeš tréningy od 15 po 60 minút, a tak si môžeš vybrať vždy to, čo zapasuje do tvojho programu.Praktický kalendár pre dlhodobú motiváciu:Úspechy treba oslavovať, a tak sme pre teba vytvorili kalendár, ktorý ti bude udeľovať ocenenia a zaznamená všetky tvoje pokroky ako:Spálené kalórieOdcvičené dni po sebeDokončené videáDokončené výzvyAk by si začala strácať motiváciu, tento kalendár ti vždy pripomenie, akú ďalekú cestu si už prešla a že sa neoplatí vzdávať. Tak čo, si pripravená vykročiť za svojou vytúženou postavou?Fitshaker aplikácia na chudnutie ti túto cestu nielen uľahčí, ale urobí z nej zábavnú dobrodružnú jazdu plnú radosti z pohybu!Poď, spolu to zvládneme.Fitshaker predplatné členstvá:Pravidelné mesačné členstvo: 9.49 €Ročné členstvo: 94.99 €Štvrťročné členstvo: 28.99 €Platby a obnovenie predplatného:Platba bude účtovaná na účet iTunes pri potvrdení nákupu. Predplatné sa automaticky obnoví, pokiaľ nebude vypnuté aspoň 24 hodín pred koncom aktuálneho obdobia. Platba za obnovenie bude účtovaná do 24 hodín pred koncom aktuálneho obdobia.Automatické obnovenie predplatného môžete spravovať alebo vypnúť v nastaveniach účtu. İster yoga ve meditasyona yeni başlamış, ister uzun zamandır bu yolculukta ol, kendi yoga akışını burada bulabilirsin. En yüksek potansiyelini uyandırmak için tasarlanmış yoga ve meditasyon derslerini dilediğin zaman dilediğin yerden yap. Hayatın akışkanlığı içinde ihtiyaçlarımız ve pratiğimizden almak istediklerimiz de değişiyor. Bazen 10 dakikan vardır, bazen 2 saatin. Bazen terlemek ve güçlenmek istersin, bazen dinlenmek ve iyi bir uykuya hazırlanmak.Hamile yogasından, ters duruşlara, stres yönetimine destek olacak pratiklerden uyku için meditasyon ve yoga derslerine, hayatının her döneminde ihtiyaç duyduğun yönlendirmeyi Flov Studio'da bulabilirsin.RİTÜELLERAy ritüelleri tüm üyeliklere dahil. Ayın enerjisinden faydalanarak yeni ay ritüellerinde yeni başlangıçlara, dolunayda serbest bırakman gerekenlere odaklan. Meditasyon, yazma pratikleri ve kartlar sayesinde hafifle ve her şeyi daha net görmeye başla.YENİ DERSLERYüzlerce yüksek kalite derse yenileri eklenmeye devam ediyor. İnternet bağlantın yoksa sorun değil, dersleri indir ve telefonun bile çekmediği yerlerde buluşalım. Matını yerleştir ve evde yogaya başla.TAKVİMPratiğinde istikrarını takvim özelliğiyle koru! Dilersen haftalık programı takip et, dilersen yapmak istediğin dersleri takvime ekleyerek kendi programını oluştur. Planlamanın heyecanıyla daha düzenli pratik yap!FİLTRELERSeviyeyi, süreyi, tempoyu ve eğitmenini belirleyerek tam aradığın derse ulaşabileceksin. Senin için hazırladığımız programları de takip ederek her gün için seçilmiş dersi yapabilir, yoga ve meditasyon pratiğinde düzenliliği koruyabilirsin. 21 gün, 28 gün veya 14 günlük programlarımız arasından sana en uygun olanı seç.MÜZİKMüziğin gücüne inanıyoruz ve ritim ile pratiğini daha da derinleştiriyoruz. Her ders için özenle hazırladığımız müzik listelerimizi dersin altında bulabilirsin. Meditasyon müzikleri eşliğinde derinleşebilir, uykuda dalmak için müzik listelerimizden ve yoga nidra derslerimizden faydalanabilirsin.FLOV CAFETopluluk sayfamızda diğer üye Flover'lar ile sohbet et. İstersen içini dök, paylaşımlarda bulun. İstersen öneri ve fikirlerini al. Burası senin güvenli alanın ve şefkatli topluluğumuz sana destek olmaya hazır.▷ Zaten üye misin? Oturum aç.▷ İlk defa mı katılıyorsun? Erişim için aboneliğini başlat.Flov Studio, otomatik olarak yenilenen abonelikler sunar.İçeriklere tüm cihazlarından sınırsız erişebileceksin. Ödeme, satın alma onayı ile hesabından tahsil edilir. Fiyatlandırma konuma göre değişir ve ödeme öncesinde onaylanır. Abonelik, mevcut fatura döneminin veya deneme süresinin (eğer teklif edilmişse) bitiminden en az 24 saat önce iptal edilmediği sürece her ay otomatik olarak yenilenir. Hesap ayarlarından istediğin zaman iptal edebilirsin.Daha fazla bilgi için:-Hizmet Şartlar: https://flovstudio.com/pages/kullanim-kosullari-Gizlilik Politikası: https://flovstudio.com/pages/gizlilik

Studiio é o aplicativo que substitui os sistemas de gestão tradicionais, oferecendo mais praticidade para organizar sua agenda, controlar presença e falta, acompanhar as reposições, documentar a evolução do aluno e controlar seus planos, pacote de sessões e mensalidades.Ainda ofereça acesso para que o aluno cancele a aula e agende sozinho as reposições ou aulas disponíveis.Mais organização do seu estúdio de Pilates, Yoga, Funcional, Pole Dance, profissionais de fisioterapia, escola de dança, centro de treinamento, aulas de beach tennis, futevôlei e outros esportes.É descomplicado de verdade! Não precisa entender nada de tecnologia, o aplicativo é interativo e prático. É só deixar ele trabalhar para você.Studiio é indicado para quem trabalha com horários agendados.Quais as vantagens de usar o Studiio?• Agenda digital e inteligente• Acesso do Aluno para que eles confirmem, desmarquem e agendem suas aulas• Controle de frequência e reposições• Gerenciamento rápido dos alunos e planos• Evolução individual para acompanhamento dos pacientes e alunos• Resumo da aula com as principais informações dos alunos em uma só tela• Controle do pacote de aula ou sessão• Mensagens prontas de lembrete sobre final de plano• Relatórios de planos finalizados e renovações• Financeiro descomplicado• Acesso para instrutores ilimitado• Quantidade de alunos ilimitados*• Importação dos contatos do seu celular para agilizar o cadastroBaixe agora gratuitamente!QUER SABER MAIS?• ACESSO DO ALUNOA liberdade que você quer para seu aluno.O aluno confirma presença, cancelar ou remarcar a aula sozinho. Tudo de acordo com as regras e prazos que estabelecer e você é notificado sempre que houver alguma mudança. O Acesso do Aluno é muito simples e intuitivo de utilizar: todos seus alunos vão conseguir mexer!• NÃO SE PERCA MAIS NAS FICHAS DOS ALUNOSDocumente o histórico do atendimento na evolução do aluno e tenha tudo no celular. • FINANCEIRO DESCOMPLICADOAcompanhe vencimentos e recebimentos em um só lugar e ganhe praticidade e rapidez!• MAIS EFICIÊNCIA COM A AGENDA INTUITIVAAgendamentos automatizados com visualização de horários vagos.• INFORMAÇÕES DOS ALUNOS DA PRÓXIMA AULA EM UM TOQUEGanhe agilidade no atendimento, com acesso a todas as informações do aluno no Resumo da Aula.• MAIS AUTONOMIA PARA SEUS INSTRUTORESConceda acesso ilimitado aos instrutores, sob seu controle.• O SEU NEGÓCIO SEM LIMITESQuantos alunos, agendamentos, reposições, planos quiser, tudo sem limites! Como usar o aplicativo no dia a dia do seu estúdio?• Inclua as informações sobre o negócio. Fique tranquilo, você faz sozinho. Em 5 minutos já está tudo configurado para começar a usar.• Inclua todos seus alunos no app, para agilizar você pode incluí-los importando os contatos do seu celular. Depois é só identificar o plano dele e fazer os agendamentos. Não tem erro, é só seguir o passo a passo.• Na hora da aula você pode: ver o resumo da aula com as informações dos alunos presentes; dar presença, falta ou gerar reposição; e adicionar a evolução do aluno. Assim tudo ficará digital e sempre com você.• Compartilhe o acesso do aluno, para ele mesmo desmarcar a aula e já agendar no dia e horário disponível que ele preferir.• Acompanhe os planos vencidos e mande mensagens prontas de lembrete sobre final de plano.*Nos planos pagos, sua assinatura Studiio é iniciada somente após confirmação da compra e estará vinculada ao seu ID Apple. Mais detalhes ou cancelamento da renovação automática, basta acessar: Ajustes > ID Apple > Assinaturas e pronto! Não há contrato de longo prazo ou multas por cancelamento, nosso objetivo é facilitar a sua vida.Termos de Uso: https://tecnofit-studiio-termo-uso.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/pdf/pt-br/termos-de-uso.pdfPolítica de Privacidade https://www.tecnofit.com.br/politica-de-privacidade/

“Die Achtsamkeitsakademie ist ein großes Geschenk. So viel geballtes Wissen und Meditationen bietet kein vergleichbares Online Portal.”“Angenehm, lehrreich, menschlich, auf jeden Fall weiter zu empfehlen.”“Mein Leben hat sich komplett verändert.”“Ich bin sehr viel klarer, gelassener und ruhiger geworden. Das fühlt sich wundervoll und ganz leicht an.”Mehr Zufriedenheit und Lebensfreude. Weniger Stress und Ängste. Die Achtsamkeitsakademie ist dein liebevoller Begleiter zu einem neuen Selbst. Es kostet nur wenige Minuten täglich und ist wissenschaftlich fundiert. Um die Funktionen der App nutzen zu können muss eine kostenpflichtige Mitgliedschaft abgeschlossen werden.Es gibt die Möglichkeit die Funkionen in einen kostenfreien Testzeitraum auszuprobieren.Funktionen:- Eine ganze Bibliothek an Meditationen, angeleiteter Entspannung und leichtem Yoga. Du kannst Favoriten speichern und auch offline mitmachen.- Lasse Bäume wachsen: Immer, wenn du meditierst, wächst in deiner App ein Bäumchen heran. Ist dein Baum “ausgewachsen”, kannst du ihn spenden und es wird dadurch in Wirklichkeit ein Baum gepflanzt. Du kannst mitverfolgen, wie viele Bäume schon durch deine Meditation gepflanzt wurden. So bringst du durch die meditierte Zeit automatisch Gutes in die Welt – neben dem inneren Frieden, der natürlich auch gut für die Welt ist!- Tägliche Impulsgeschichten, die in 3-4 Minuten mehr Achtsamkeit in deinen Tag bringen.- Eine Community, die sich auf Wohlbefinden und inneres Wachstum fokussiert. Meditiere gemeinsam mit anderen oder nutze die Austauschrunden über Videocall, um vielleicht sogar neue Freundschaften entstehen zu lassen.- Du findest alle Kurse der Achtsamkeitsakademie praktisch in der App.Die Mission der Achtsamkeitsakademie ist ein kleiner gesellschaftlicher Wandel: Von einer hektischen Leistungsgesellschaft hin zu mehr Frieden, Verbundenheit und Ausgeglichenheit. Unsere Werte der Achtsamkeit, Authentizität und Verbundenheit und dass wir das, was wir tun, mit dem Herzen tun wollen, liegen all unseren Kursen und Inhalten zugrunde. Du findest Meditationen und Inhalte zu Themen wie: - Ängste und Sorgen loslassen- Verspannungen lösen- Schneller einschlafen und erholsamer schlafen- Mit herausfordernden Emotionen umgehen- Gedanken beruhigen- Krisen begegnen- Selbstvertrauen stärken- Inneres Kind- Verbundenheit mit anderen- Weisheit- Mitgefühl- Dankbarkeit- Das Herz öffnenWie viel Zeit benötigt man für die Achtsamkeitsakademie? Es braucht nur wenige Minuten, um erste Effekte zu bemerken. Und unser Team lässt sich laufend Neues einfallen, damit du Achtsamkeit spielend einfach und fast automatisch in deinen Alltag einbauen kannst. Wirkt es auch bei mir? Achtsamkeit ist gut erforscht und deren positive Wirkung auf das Wohlbefinden mehrfach bestätigt. Doch probieren geht über studieren: Probiere es in der kostenfreien Testwoche gerne einfach selbst! So gehst du kein Risiko ein. Wie kann ich die Achtsamkeitsakademie nutzen? Die Achtsamkeitsakademie-Mitgliedschaft ist ein Monats- oder Jahresabonnement. Mit der Anmeldung hierzu erhältst du sofortigen Zugriff auf tägliche Achtsamkeitsimpulse, unsere Bibliothek geführter Meditationen und regelmäßigen Live-Austausch, sowie einen Mini-Einführungskurs in Achtsamkeit und Meditation. Du kannst problemlos kündigen - jederzeit, online. Außerdem kannst du die Kurse der Achtsamkeitsakademie je nach Interesse hinzubuchen. Wenn du an einem Kurs teilnimmst, erhältst du dauerhaften Zugriff auf diesen. Wir freuen uns auf dich! Herzlich, dein Peter Beer (Gründer der Achtsamkeitsakademie) + das gesamte TeamNutzungsbedingungen: https://docs.achtsamkeitsakademie.de/nutzungsbedingungen

Claim your free week with the trial to use any Harmony Hypnosis session. Discover how to become calm and confident using meditation therapy and self hypnosis. The app offers you an experience as close to seeing a real hypnotherapist, enabling you to create a personalized program based on your specific needs.*Enhance your ability to relax & sleep well*Reduce anxiety, tension and stress.*Build on your core sense of inner strength, focus, wellness and power.*Gain more confidence, self love and inner control. *Save time and achieve goals more quickly and easily.Listen to a mesmerizing hypnosis session every day for 7 days and notice the difference in how good you feel. You can also access dozens of sessions on multiple subjects through our subscription service, with new wellness topics added regularly. Downloaded by millions, our apps have won at The Dot Comm Awards, Best App Ever Awards & Best Mobile App Awards, The IMA Awards and recommended by US doctors via Healthtap. Harmony integrates with health app to record the physiological benefits of self hypnosis.The recordings use unique special effects including:Dual Vocal Delivery, where different suggestions or metaphors are delivered separately yet simultaneously through the right and left headphones. The effect is deeply hypnotic and helps mesmerize the unconscious mind into accepting beneficial suggestions with less conscious interference. Adapted to You and Your Everyday LifeGØT is not another new slimming or fitness app.  GØT is your personal gut trainer in your pocket.  Always available, and with achievable goals that can be adapted to your everyday life - not the other way around.GØT Is Holistic GØT targets the whole, addressing all areas that affect your intestinal health.  While other apps focus on just one area, GØT will help you make good choices in all the important areas that play together for you to have good gut health: sleep, activity, stress management, and diet. No Counting CaloriesForget calorie counting and strict diets.  With GØT, there is more focus on the enjoyment of food.  About eating more of everything that is good for you, and replacing what we know destroys.  There is no logging of food, just a large library of recipes that you can safely enjoy without worry. Check In and See How Your GØT Score Develops You can connect GØT to a number of external devices and health apps and have your unique GØT Score calculated - a measure of inflammation level and intestinal health.  Over time, you can track the effects of the changes you make, and see how your level of inflammation is reduced and your gut health is strengthened.  You should literally be able to feel the effect on your body and mind, and your GØT score gives invaluable feedback that you can use to make new changes in the areas you need.Once you strengthen the intestinal flora, a lot of the work is done.  Good gut health is good health.  Good intestinal health repairs and prevents. If you have a smart watch or fitness device, you can connect it and broaden your whole-body advancement. Say Hello to Your Personal Gut Trainer With GØT, you have taken the first step towards a more balanced, anti-inflammatory, and health-promoting lifestyle.  You have received a simple tool that makes lifestyle change feasible, even fun and motivating!  You get daily tips and advice, feedback, and motivational reminders - all based on your goals and your use of the app.  GØT is built on a proven method that has helped thousands to take small, health-promoting steps every day that over time become a health-promoting lifestyle.
